Package elki.distance.minkowski

Class ManhattanDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • elki.distance.minkowski.LPNormDistance
      • elki.distance.minkowski.LPIntegerNormDistance
        • elki.distance.minkowski.ManhattanDistance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Distance<NumberVector>, Norm<NumberVector>, NumberVectorDistance<NumberVector>, PrimitiveDistance<NumberVector>, SpatialPrimitiveDistance<NumberVector>
    @Alias({"taxicab","cityblock","l1"})
public class ManhattanDistance
extends LPIntegerNormDistance
    Manhattan distance for NumberVectors.

    Manhattan distance is defined as: \[ \text{Manhattan}(\vec{x},\vec{y}) := \sum_i |x_i-y_i| \]

    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Arthur Zimek
